#include<stdio.h>
#include<iostream>
#include<math.h>
#include<string.h>
using namespace std;
int main()

{
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
    long long int i,j,k,m;

    cin>>i;
    cin>>j;
    cin>>k;
    m=k%(i+j);
    if(m<=i && m>0)
    cout<<"Aman"<<endl;
    else
    cout<<"Anish"<<endl;

    }
  return 0;
}
